translations: v．行为不端，行为失当：指某人的行为不符合规范、礼貌或道德标准。
· The child misbehaves when his parents are not around.
孩子在父母不在身边时行为失当。

sentences.sentence: Why not whip the teacher when the pupil misbehaves?
sentences.translation: 当小学生们行为不当的时候，为什么不鞭责老师呢？

sentences.sentence: He not only tells lies but also misbehaves with everybody.
sentences.translation: 他不但说谎而且对每个人都没有礼貌。
